alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 1:39PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McIntosh and northwestern Pittsburg Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 139 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles southwest of Haywood, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Eufaula... Savanna... Crowder... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Ashland... Stidham... Raiford... Haywood... Vivian... Scipio... Arpelar... Vernon... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
